hiveArticle.title: Soon the Sky will be Covered by Dark Clouds
hiveArticle.body:
There are so many moments in our life where we know that bad things gonna happen and how are we going to fix it is the real challenge in front of us just like the below picture where the Sky will be soon covered by dark clouds. 

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVUTGSpLcQa525iTJRCSLyJ3cTifKKCf7PaYEXegTQqeS/image.png)

### Camera : Nokia 6
